name: StandUpReminder
0:
”Alexa, open stand up reminder”
”Alexa, start stand up reminder”
”three”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: stand up reminder
des:
The Stand Up Reminder reminds you to work for 45 minutes then stand up for 5 minutes to take a break. You can specify the number of rounds for the work session and we will keep reminding you! 
During the 5 minutes break, we suggest random activities that you can enjoy to relax and have fun. By actually resting during this time, your mind will be rejuvenated to tackle problems and strive through the next work sessions. 

Our motivation behind this skill is to help you move your body because sitting for a long time has some serious health concerns and we wanted to help you in a natural way.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
